spec_data.Name: perl-Data-Rmap
spec_data.Description:
This perl module evaluates a BLOCK over a list of data structures
recursively (locally setting $_ to each element) and return the list
composed of the results of such evaluations.  $_ can be used to modify
the elements.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:26:15 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Recursive map, apply a block to a data structure
